job.title: Data Scientist / Data Analyst
job.description: <p><span>Description:</span></p><p><br></p><p>Data&nbsp;Scientist&nbsp;/&nbsp;Data&nbsp;Analyst Requirements</p><p><br></p><p>Location: Anywhere in US but wiling to work Pacific hours.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3+ years of&nbsp;data&nbsp;science,&nbsp;data&nbsp;analytics, or business intelligence experience</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>Strong understanding of SQL&nbsp;&nbsp;( Strong - Strong)</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with conducting&nbsp;data&nbsp;analysis in&nbsp;<strong>Python and / or R</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>(Tableau - Strong )</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levels</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insights</p><p><strong>Pluses</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with Superset</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with running weblab experiments, efficacy studies, or product validation tests</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with machine learning basics</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with Airbnb infrastructure, including Airflow, Presto SQL, and Hive SQL</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience creating and maintaining&nbsp;data&nbsp;pipelines</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience supporting engineering product work</p><p><br></p>
